analysis.key_quote: If federal employees can not be honest, out of concern they will be fired for finding information that shows a government plan or popular policy will not work, then money, time, and potentially lives will be lost trying to implement policy that will not work.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the potential for politicization of the federal workforce and the loss of honest, informed decision-making. It emphasizes the importance of due diligence and the integrity of federal employees, which aligns with a defense of merit-based systems and employee rights.
